channel.title: IPhone 3g [S]
channel.description:
Since MS have Zune HD, Apple announces Iphone 3g special edition dubbed "Ass". It's twice as faster, has 3 megapixel video camera (+video editing software right on the device. what?) and finally has 32 gb of flash memory. Plus now it supports 3g tethering. While 16gb fucking costs 199 bucks.
And old 8gb 3g now costs 99 bucks. [url]https://www.apple.com/iphone/specs.html[/url]
Available from june 19.
EDIT: oh shit Zune HD is not a cellphone....

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Why the fuck does the Iphone cost £350 in pounds, but only $99 in dollers? It makes no sense!

Have apple forgotten the exchange rate or something?

Different subsidies. Depending on which contract you go for, the phone company will chop a bunch off the price of the handset. I believe you get a free iPhone if you agree to hand O2 £75 a month.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: Crunchy
item.description:
What’s with all the iphone hate? I would get one if I could afford it and by that I mean that there are dozens of other things I would rather have, but if I had tons of extra money lying around I would by an iphone.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: pRiSoN_mIkE
item.description:
iPhone rocks. 3.0 is even better. Only paid $99 for mine two months ago, on a renewal. Costs me $60 a month; 500Mb, unlimited texting, evenings, weekends, 250 daytime, visual voicemail, call and name display. 8Gb: plenty. Who needs thousands of songs with them at one time, when you have to charge it every day?

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: zwaldowski
item.description:
Fear of lack of buttons and price aside, I enjoy my iPhone 3G (bought for cheap on Craigslist, of course) very much. The 3.0 update only makes it better.

I can’t even imagine myself separating my phone and PMP again… it’s just the little things that are cool, like going on a bike ride or run while listening to music and being able to pick up your phone.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Requires new two-year AT&T wireless service contract, sold separately to qualified customers; credit check required; must be 18 or older. For non-qualified customers, including existing AT&T customers who want to upgrade from another phone or replace an iPhone 3G, the price with a new two-year agreement is $499 (8GB ), $599 (16GB ), or $699 (32GB ).

Fuck it. I don’t live in America anyway. Buy it for $99, go home, jailbreak the fucker, unlock it and put your SIM card in it. Voila.
Oh wait, they don’t have a jailbreak for 3.0.
I am disappoint.
Whatever.

That means I could buy a PS3 for the price of an 8gb iPhone

Funny how I got mine first-edition 60gb PS3 (with emotion engine) brand new for $249
Singapore FTW

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 3g [S]
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
I love my iPod Video with 80 gigabytes, 20 hours of battery, has been running for years, and makes a useful back up for extra files.

Why not get a phone separate from an iPod? It’s cheaper AND more efficient (besides having to use more than one pocket).
